name: Little Cosmonaut
description:
Little Cosmonaut is an action roguelike game made in two weeks for the Beginners Circle Jam #3! The theme of the jam was "A different Planet"

You take the role of a little explorer who is exploring different planets and gathering resources while he is listening to his favorite music.

There is limited content at this stage of the game and it's more like a demo. But i would love to explore this project a little bit more beyond the game jam ^^ any feedback would be helpful!

Controls

Move  : WASD

Shoot : Left Mouse Button or Shift

Dash : Right Mouse Button or Space

Music by  https://www.tandess.com/en/music
